text: well I I think the movie was somewhat
misleading in this Regard in fact the
hospital had been opened in 1919 1920
for the first victims of what was then
an epidemic sweeping across the world
and uh some of them had been there for
for 40 years or more um although when I
walked in and
I I saw these motionless speechless
transfixed figures sometimes in very
strange
postures uh this was completely outside
my experience or imagination I'd never
seen anything like this in a sense these
fossilized human beings at that time
there was no medical approach which was
of any use to them um uh although it had
always been observed that they could
move sometimes and speak under special
circumstances and uh among these uh was
was when music was present
